title: Chill and Happy
author: Sentenialst0ner
citation: Citation:   Sentenialst0ner. "Chill and Happy: experience with Spearmint (ID 82399)". Erowid.org. Nov 23, 2009. erowid.org/exp/82399

[ Switch Colors ]
report: Listen, I got bored one day and my friend was nagging me to try this, so I grabbed some papers from gum rappers and rolled that shit up and got a mild to medium high and I was really happy and felt tired yet alert. This was many years ago and I stopped at 15. I did it about 6 more times. Every time I felt the same. A few years later I tried weed, pills, liquor, and cigarettes. I've quit all but the drinking. A cheap relaxing high.
